outcome events were poorly captured in the 
routine health information system. To correct for 
this problem, SMGL-supported staff conducted 
a retrospective POMS in November 2012 in 
16 CEmONC facilities (hospitals and Level IV 
health centers), collecting data from the period 
January 2011 - October 2012.  From November 
2012 on, POMS collected data prospectively.
The POMS captured individual-level 
data on the outcomes of pregnant women 
who received care at these facilities. Births
